============================================
Description:                               =
============================================

Styx: Master of Shadows is an infiltration game with RPG elements
taking place in a dark fantasy universe, where you sneak, steal and
assassinate your way through as Styx, a Goblin two-centuries of age
Deep inside the vertiginous and multi-layered forsaken Tower of
Akenash, where Humans and Elves protect the World-Tree, source of
the Amber - a powerful and magical golden sap - is hidden Styx'
chance to understand his true origin... and to make a fortune at
the same time
